title: Fake astrologer scamming in instagram
selftext:
Fake astrologer scamming in instagram

Hello friends, i would like to inform/warn you u about a instagram scammer and so called scammer astrologer.He takes money in advance and ask people to book appointment for his consultation and asks money through his upi scanner and after sending amount , he said i will get call , but no one called me after waiting for 5/6 days , and when i asked him
To return money , he said ,‚Äù he will not return money jo karna hai kar lo , mera koi kuch nai kar sakta n all‚Äù and he blocked me from everywhere.

Friends its not about money, its about these sort of people degrading our hinduism culture in name of astrology by scamming people, 
‚ÄúPlease report his instagrm account‚Äù , so that he stops scamming peope in name of hinduism culture.Just think he has 17 k followers in instagram, how many people he might be scamming in daily basis, we all need to teach him a lesson guys.
comments:
This.
I was like, as opposed to who? Real astrologers?
Can't wait for my A.I astrologer to show me my good fortunes üîÆ
bro you went to an astrologer , wtf were you expecting ?
Exactly same. Fake something means a real version must be available.
Fake & astrologer redundant word when both mean same¬†
